EmailTemplate.name: WorkItemArchive_Approvals-Data_csvFile_Email_Template
EmailTemplate.Body:
Dear Sir/Madam,
This email contains a csv file of approval items from SailPoint IdentityIQ. The attached file includes the detailed approval items data report. If you have any questions or further assistance, do not hesitate to contact the Eshiam IAM Team.
Thanks,

Argument.name: file
Argument.Description: The name of the Identity that launched the workflow.

EmailTemplate.Subject: Changes requested to $identityDisplayName need approval
